name: Centaur Consulting
memberOrga: None, but the key fora that we currently manage (RTIG and UDG) have a range of members including UK cities, public transport operators, consultancies, and systems suppliers
goal: Provide informed research, analysis, advice and management services to stakeholders in public and private sectors about policy, strategy, standards and implementation programmes related to intelligent transport systems
interests: Information Society, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Relevant elements of Horizon 2020; ITS Directive; ITS standards mandates; C-ITS Platform
customers: European Commission,Real Time Information Group Ltd
